divs: Sighting Detailslooked out back window and watched a white disc shaped object move to the East. It was roof top level. as it got closer to me It was solid, and White very bright and had lights around it. It was moving very fast.I watched it as it moved infront of the condos behind me, on Pleasantdale rd.I watched but it never returned to the area.
Summary: watched a disc shaped object fly at a fast pace, It was solid white.very fast.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around February 26th 2009
